verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Victory is mine! Victory is mine!
Victory today is mine!
I told Satan: Get thee behind!
Victory today is mine.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Joy is mine! Joy is mine!
Joy today is mine!
I told Satan: Get thee behind!
Joy today is mine!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Peace is mine! Peace is mine!
Peace today is mine!
I told Satan; Get thee behind!
Peace today is mine!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Happiness is mine!
Happiness is mine!
Happiness today is mine!
I told Satan: Get thee behind!
Happiness today is mine!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Faith is mine! Faith is mine!
Faith today is mine!
I told Satan: Get thee behind!
Faith today is mine!
